name: JamPay
overview:
JamPay is a revolutionary mobile shopping solution that allows businesses sell products directly through direct mailers, emails, SMS and social media such as Facebook using few clicks.

Why Jam­Pay? For Merchants: –> Leverage mobile technology to enable sales from all direct marketing channels –> Sell to consumers when you have their attention –> Enable impulse buying –> No development or maintenance required for iPhone/
Android apps, infrastructure (product and inventory data, payments, shipping, transaction data and more) –> Managing security, scalability, performance –> Overall, increased sales and reduced transaction time, costs, errors

For Consumers: –> Jam­Pay enables expedited (only few clicks) pur­chas­ing by scan­ning or clicking a QR code using their mobile phone. –> No longer do you have to fill forms, enter credit card and ship­ping details every sin­gle time you make a purchase. –> With a sin­gle account you can pur­chase prod­ucts from any merchant. –> Share your lat­est pur­chases with friends on Face­book and Twitter. –> Inno­v­a­tive locker-key tech­nol­ogy guar­an­tees secure transactions.
